name: Arlecchino
description: An acrobatic, mischievous, and resourceful servant. Often in love and always hungry. Wears a colorful patched costume.

name: Pantalone
description: A greedy, wealthy, and lecherous old merchant from Venice. He is often the father of one of the lovers and is constantly being tricked.

name: Il Dottore
description: A self-proclaimed 'doctor' who is comically inept and loves to show off his supposed knowledge with Latin phrases. He is often a friend of Pantalone.

name: Columbina
description: A clever and cheeky maidservant. She is often Arlecchino's lover and the only truly intelligent person on stage.

name: Il Capitano
description: A bragging, swaggering, and cowardly soldier who boasts of his great feats in love and war but is terrified of his own shadow.
